text: Lottia orbignyi is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Lottiidae, one of the families of true limpets.Rosenberg, G. (2014). Lottia orbignyi (Dall, 1909). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=766513 on 2014-07-16 ==Description== ==Distribution== San Pablo, Peru (18°sur) hasta Pirulil, isla de Chiloé, Chile (42°sur) ==References== * Nakano T. & Ozawa T. (2007). Worldwide phylogeography of limpets of the order Patellogastropoda: molecular, morphological and paleontological evidence. Journal of Molluscan Studies 73(1): 79–99. ==External links== * Category:Lottiidae Category:Gastropods described in 1909
title: Lottia orbignyi
